name: Notion SEO Audit (150+ checks)
description: If you love Notion and you love SEO, this product is for you. I've created this easy to use SEO audit with a variety of different categories, and items for you to inspect. Upon completing the audit, you'll have a full Kanban board of remaining priorities that you can then use in Notion, or export to tools such as Trello. "This is incredibly thorough. Our client will love this!" - web agency project manager
